name: Heroes of Light
description:
Heroes of Light its a fast paced Action - RPG. The game features a huge world to explore, several playable characters, an in depth looting system, innovative combat mechanics, beautiful graphics and amazing boss fights.



Key Features:

- Hundreds of action packed battles
- Boss fights every 4 levels
- Beautiful environments, highly polished animations and effects
- Uncommon, Rare, Epic quality loot/equpiment system
- Five unique classes with unique game mechanics
- Unique monster-telegraph combat system
- Build your character stats!
- Character customization
- Awesome sound track
- Support for both iPad and iPhone.
